resources.string:
In order to run correctly, ZapTorch needs to enable a system Accessibility Service. 

 ZapTorch needs this to observe when you press the Volume keys to turn on the flash light. 

 It watches the following commands: 

 ↓ ↓ - Toggle flash light 
 ↑ ↑ - Pulse slowly 
 ↓ ↑ - Strobe effect quickly 

 It does not collect any information. It does not monitor anything else at all. 

 Please Enable ZapTorch in the System Accesibility Settings.

ZapTorch needs this to observe when you press the Volume keys to turn on the flash light. 

 It watches the following commands: 

 ↓ ↓ - Toggle flash light 
 ↑ ↑ - Pulse slowly 
 ↓ ↑ - Strobe effect quickly 

 It does not collect any information. It does not monitor anything else at all.
